name: Resizable Auto Layout Spacer
description:
Leverage the ability to override "Spacing Between" values to resize objects within instances of Auto Layout main components.

To demonstrate the spacer component's use, I've included a bar chart, a slider/progress bar, and a dialog box with a replaceable image.

Duplicate this file to grab the resizable spacer component and to see how the spacer is implemented in the above examples.

Looking forward to seeing other spacer uses!

---
Update 2020-06-19: Got help from D. S. to reduce the spacer end points to 0px x 0px. The "spacing between" value is now equal to its x, y dimensions, which makes resizing a lot easier. Thank you for the tip!
